Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class PizzaCreationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.PizzaCreationController
public class PizzaCreationController extends Object
This class modifies the ui elements of the PizzaCreationView to manage the creation of a pizza the class has methods to modify or instance javafx components in order of the client or user can create his o her own pizza
Author:
Santiago Caballero

    Method
    Description
    private void
    createAddIngredientButton()
    This method instances the add button providing a text and a style css class

    createCancelIngredientButton()
    This method instances the cancel button providing a text and a style css class

    getIngredientChosenLabel()
    This method returns the label of the ingredient chosen in the ingredients comboBox of the ui
    void
    goBackAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Method to go back to the previous screen
    void
    initialize()
    This method will be called when the fxml file is created to initialize its components It calls the necessary methods to set the pizza creation menu
    private void
    initializeIngredientsDropBar()
    This method fill the ingredients drop box items with the ingredients available
    private void
    initializePizzaSizesDropBar()
    This method fill the pizza Sizes drop box items with the pizza sizes available
    private void
    manageAddAction()
    This method will add an ingredient to the pizza ingredients list when the add button is pressed When the add button is pressed the confirmation box and the ingredient info Box will be removed The drop box is able again The pizza Information box will be updated
    private void
    manageCancelActionEvent()
    This method manages the events are going to happen when the cancel button is pressed When the cancel button is pressed the confirmation box and the ingredient info Box will be removed The drop box is able again
    private void
    orderPizza()
    This method orders the pizza created when the continue button is pressed
    void
    orderPizzaAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method will be in charge of managing the navigation when user ends to create the pizza It will send the new orders' data to Home Order
    private void
    resetPizzaInformationBox()
    This method updates the pizza information box with the new information received first removes the pizzaInformationBox, then update the information of the model to show on its controller
    private void
    setCounterLabel()
    This method sets the counter label text with the size of pizzas created orders ArrayList The method counts the pizzas created from the database to set the counter label
    private void
    setIngredientConfirmationBox(javafx.scene.control.Label ingredientChosen)
    This method sets the elements of the principal confirmation Vbox with the horizontalBox of the chosen ingredient, add button and cancel button
    private void
    setPizzaIngredientsList()
    This method receives the ingredient chosen by the client on the ui and adds it to the model the method compares if the ingredient chosen is on the list of ingredients to add it into the pizza ingredientsList
    private void
    setPizzaSize()
    This method sets the sizeName with the selected size item of the drop Box the method tries to validate the continue button when a size item is selected
    void
    showConfirmationBox()
    This method is in charge of showing the confirmation box if the client wants to add an ingredient or not The method calls the methods to create a label, an add button and a cancel button showing the ingredient chosen
    private void
    showIngredientInfo(String ingredientChosen)
    This method shows the ingredient information box chosen by the user the method instances the ingredient controller to display its information
    private void
    showPizzaImage()
    This method just shows a pizza image to give some style to the scene
    void
    updateDBOrders(DBOrders dbOrders)
    This method will be used to update the database orders to the one received from the HomeOrder with all the orders from the different screens
    private void
    updatePizzaInfo()
    This method sets the model attributes with the elements given by the user on the ui the method sets the prize and the size in the model with the information chosen by the client
    private void
    validateContinueButton()
    The method enables the continue button just if the user has chosen a size and 3 o more ingredients

    • setPizzaIngredientsList

      private void setPizzaIngredientsList()
      This method receives the ingredient chosen by the client on the ui and adds it to the model the method compares if the ingredient chosen is on the list of ingredients to add it into the pizza ingredientsList

    • validateContinueButton

      private void validateContinueButton()
      The method enables the continue button just if the user has chosen a size and 3 o more ingredients

    • orderPizzaAction

      public void orderPizzaAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method will be in charge of managing the navigation when user ends to create the pizza It will send the new orders' data to Home Order
      Parameters:
      event - the button Continue action event
      Throws:
      IOException - when a fxml file can not be loaded

    • goBackAction

      public void goBackAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - when the fxml file can not be loaded

      This method orders the pizza created when the continue button is pressed

      private void setCounterLabel()
      This method sets the counter label text with the size of pizzas created orders ArrayList The method counts the pizzas created from the database to set the counter label

    • showConfirmationBox

      public void showConfirmationBox()
      This method is in charge of showing the confirmation box if the client wants to add an ingredient or not The method calls the methods to create a label, an add button and a cancel button showing the ingredient chosen
